cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DRB 完整性設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止正確的安全設定。
